name: Any Volunteers?
description:
or display

Any Volunteers? Is an interactive story game which takes place at a theatre, run by the sly Magician, Showrunner. Explore the stage and be a part of the magic.

Made for  DMSPILJAM Feb 2020

Made in 48 hours.

Category: Youth

Controls:

Move on A and D, on keyboard For left and right respectfully

Other controls are stated in the game.
